name: One Last Memory (itch)
description:
One Last Memory is a 3D Mystery Adventure Game created during my Game Design studies at the ZHDK. 

The game was created over 3 months. 

The Player finds themselves inside the main character's house, accompanied by her Teddy Bear Bozo,  her childhood friend and representative of her subconscious.

The player has to interact with objects inside and around the house to solve puzzles and unravel the mystery about what happened to the main character, Isla. 

Bozo will occasionally tell stories of the past. It's important to listen to what he says, as he could give hints about what happened or what to do. 

Controls: 

WASD to Move

Left Mouse click to Interact

E to put Object into Inventory

Tab to open Inventory

Credits: 

Alex Martin: Game Design, 2D design, Puzzle Design, Sound Design, Voice Acting.

Ava Thalheim: Programming, Game Design, Puzzle Design, 3D Art, Animation
